page1.descripG:
Vivacs del Plata is nestled
in the picturesque Valle de Uco,
at the base of the majestic
Cerro El Plata, one of the
highest peaks in the Andes,
Soaring at 5970 meters
above sea level.
page1.descrip1G:
Vivacs del Plata  is a family-owned
ranch in the Andes Mountain range
in Mendoza Argentina.
page1.descrip2G:
Experience hassle-free transportation to our farm facilities with Vivacs del Plata! As part of our commitment to providing exceptional service, we offer transportation options in our reliable fleet of three 4x4 Toyota vehicles.
Whether you're arriving from Mendoza downtown or Mendoza airport, we are delighted to offer round-trip transportation at a price of U$D 250 per vehicle, each vehicle being able to transport up to 4 guests. Enjoy a comfortable ride as you soak in the scenic beauty on road to our farm.
If you're coming from Valle de Uco wineries, we offer the same excellent service at a discounted rate of U$D 200 (4 PAX max) per vehicle.
page1.descrip3G:
Soar above the picturesque Valle de Uco with a helicopter ride
to our ranch.Enjoy a privileged vantage point as you witness the
breathtaking beauty of the region from the air.For availability
and rates, please contact us directly.
page1.descrip4G:
To reach our rural farm stay from Mendoza downtown, you have two options: the scenic routes via Potrerillos or Ugarteche. Both roads offer stunning landscapes along the way. While the final 25 kilometres consist of dirt roads, it is accessible by various types of vehicles.
We recommend using a pick-up truck for optimal comfort.

page2.descripF:
Learn more! Here are some common
questions about Vivacs del Plata.
page2.preg1: How does the transfer service operate?
page2.resp1: The transfer service covers trips from the airport, downtown Mendoza, or Valle de Uco to Vivacs del Plata, as well as the return journey, all at a flat rate.
page2.preg2: What is the capacity for the sailing excursion?
page2.resp2: Our sailing excursions are tailored to accommodate up to eight crew members.
page2.resp3: Vivacs del Plata, located at 2100 meters above sea level, offers diverse temperatures. Expect a wide range of temperatures between day and night. Enjoy pleasant summers with sunblock and light clothing, while winters can be sub-zero.
page2.preg4: What does the all-inclusive experience include?
page2.resp4: Our all-inclusive experience includes unlimited food and wine for every meal, along with a wide range of activities at your disposal. It allows you to fully enjoy each moment without worrying about additional expenses.
page2.preg5: What is the overnight capacity of the inn?
page2.resp5: We offer 3 cozy suits to suit your preferences.
page2.resp6:
For any other questions, please contact us here
or write us at vivacsdelplata@gmail.com

index.descripI:
Steeped in history, Vivacs del Plata has been
in the Palma family for more than 200 years,
recently opening its doors to share its culture,
traditions and a variety of activities to guests
from all over the world.

page4.descrip: What sets us apart is our unwavering commitment to personalized exclusive service.
page4.descrip2:
If you have any questions or need any general
information, please complete this form to
request the information you need. We will be
pleased to help you.
page4.name: Your name

page5.descrip:
Welcome to Vivacs del Plata's memories. Send us
your pictures to be featured!

page6.descrip1A: We strive to make your experience effortless and unforgettable. From horseback riding through rolling hills to hiking along picturesque trails, you can discover enchanting landscapes at your own pace. Engage in exciting farm tours, learn about our traditional practices, or simply relax amidst the serenity of nature.
page6.descrip2A:
Whether you seek adventure
or relaxation, Vivacs del Plata
is the perfect retreat.
page6.WELCOME WITH COFFEE <br> AND TEMPTING SN:
WELCOME WITH COFFEE
AND TEMPTING SNACKS
page6.AFTERNOON OUTING <br> OR RELAX IN THE HO:
AFTERNOON OUTING
OR RELAX IN THE HOUSE
page6.WELCOME WITH COFFE <br> AND TEMPTING SNA:
WELCOME WITH COFFE
AND TEMPTING SNACKS
page6.Halfday1:
Short on time? Experience a taste of the Argentinian countryside with our flexible
outing package. Choose an activity accompanied by delightful wine in the Heights
and delicious bites.
page6.Halfday2:
Our half day experience lasts no more than 4 hours allowing you to seamlessly
fit into your morning morning or afternoon schedule.
page6.horseback descrip:
Experiencie the thrill of our guest-favorite horseback riding tour!
Let us guide you through 400 hectares of Vivacs del Plata, where you'll encounter diverse flora and fauna, surrounded by the natural beauty of the mountains. Choose between a short ride of 45 minutes or opt
for the long option, which takes you on a captivating journey lasting 3 hours.
page6.debajode4x4:
Sit back and relax as our
experienced drivers take
you on a guided 4x4 tour of
Vivacs del Plata. Explore the
vast landscape, from the
ranch itself to the majestic
mountains, all from the
comfort of your seat.
page6.debajodecicl:
For an unparalleled cycling
experience in nature at an
altitude of 2,100 meters above
sea level, Vivacs del Plata is
a dream come true. While it
can be challenging at times,
the rewards of cycling in the
Andes are truly worth the effort.
Our knowledgeable guide will
accompany you and select the
trail that best matches your
ability.
page6.debajodetrekk:
Unleash your adventurous spirit
and immerse yourself in nature
by embarking on a trekking
adventure through the prairies
and hills of Vivacs del Plata.
It's an excellent opportunity to
find tranquility and engage in
meditation. You can request a
guide or, go exploring by yourself.
page6.1: Whether you crave traditional Argentinean barbecue, fresh vegetables, or exquisite local wines, every meal is a celebration of our rich gastronomic heritage.
page6.2:
The culinary journey is led by our talented chef who is not only an experienced “asador” but also
a true mountain man.
page6.3:
With a deep understanding of
the art of grilling our chef brings
a unique blend of expertise and
passion to each culinary creation.
page6.4:
While beef is the quintessential
choice at Vivacs del Plata, we are
delighted to accommodate your
preferences with options such as
lamb, pork, fish or goat, provided
you inform us in advance.
page6.5:
We understand the importance
of catering to individual dietary
needs, and we are pleased to
offer vegetarian options for
guests who prefer plant-based
delights. Simply let us know
about any special dietary
requirements, and we will ensure
that your culinary experience is
tailored to your preferences.
page6.6:
Rest assured, all of these
delectable dining experiences
are included under the daily
rate, allowing you to indulge
in a range of culinary delights
without any additional cost.
page6.des1:
Whether you're traveling
with family or friends, our
accomodations are designed
o cater to your every need.
page6.des2:
Each space is meticulously designed to provide a haven of tranquility,
offering panoramic views that will take your breath away.
page6.n1:
Our day in Vivacs del Plata in early
January has got to be one of the best
experiences that my wife and I have
ever been on...
page6.n2:
We wanted a escape from wine country
and a chance to see the spectacular
Andes mountains and experience an
authentic Mendocino barbecue...
